newsitem.title: UK: ATHLETICS-HANSEN WINS APPEAL TO COMPETE IN WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-HANSEN WINS APPEAL TO COMPETE IN WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS.

text.p: Triple jumper Ashia Hansen will compete in next week's world indoor athletics championships in Paris after winning an appeal against not being selected, British officials said on Saturday.
Hansen, fifth at last year's Olympics, had been left off the British team because she did not compete at the national trials last month, a condition of selection.
But the British Athletics Federation (BAF) said on Saturday that it had accepted Hansen's case that she was unaware of the selection requirements.
